Detailed Description

This class provides the same capabilities as the RTRString class plus the following:.

  • return whether the value is "true" or "false"
  • if this value is delimited, return a list of the delimited values based on a given delimiter character
  • conversion from integer to hexidecimal or octal value
See RTRString for a listing of other features.

See Also:
RTRListOfExternalValue
